CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Standard Dine-in relative to Express Takeaway?
SRP.A: Standard Dine-in is {above} Express Takeaway in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Express Takeaway relative to Large Group Booking?
SRP.A: Express Takeaway is {below} Large Group Booking in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Standard Dine-in relative to Large Group Booking?
SRP.A: Standard Dine-in is {above} Large Group Booking in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total average order value?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Large Group Booking}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total average order value?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Standard Dine-in}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Standard Dine-in's maximum Average Order Value in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Standard Dine-in's maximum Average Order Value is in {2017}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Express Takeaway's minimum Average Order Value in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Express Takeaway's minimum Average Order Value is in {2009}.

NC.Q: Between 2002 and 2019, was the average total Average Order Value higher or lower than between 2004 and 2005?
NC.A: The average total average order value between 2002 and 2019 was {higher} than between 2004 and 2005.

NC.Q: Between 1998 and 2014, was the average total Average Order Value higher or lower than between 2006 and 2018?
NC.A: The average total average order value between 1998 and 2014 was {higher} than between 2006 and 2018.

NC.Q: Was the total Average Order Value in 2001 higher or lower than in 2010?
NC.A: The total average order value in 2001 was {higher} than in 2010.

NC.Q: Was the total Average Order Value in 1996 higher or lower than in 2013?
NC.A: The total average order value in 1996 was {lower} than in 2013.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Express Takeaway} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Large Group Booking and Standard Dine-in first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Large Group Booking and Standard Dine-in first exchanged leading positions in {1995}.
